The American Indian Science and Engineering Society (AISES) at UC Santa Barbara (UCSB) is affiliated with the greater [American Indian Science and Engineering Society](https://aises.org/) and exists to support current UCSB Indigenous students interested in the science and engineering fields.

<br>

## Our Purpose

- To stimulate and develop Indigenous student interest in science and engineering
- To provide academic assistance and financial support through scholarships
- To strive in promoting Indigenous participation at all levels of responsibility in science and engineering
- To endeavor in the advancement of Indigenous professional scientists and engineers
- To build a sense of community and pride in our heritage
